title: Saint West Is Getting So Big! | PerezHilton.com
text:
2/27/2017 10:18 PM ET | Filed under: Baby Blabber • Kanye West • Kim Kardashian • Family • Celeb Kidz • Reality TV • KUWTK • Saint West 
Saint West is growing up SO FAST! 
Even though Kanye West 's son is only one, the adorable toddler has changed so much ever since he was born in December 2015! 
On Monday, mommy Kim Kardashian posted the (above) throwback pic of her and her bundle of joy with the caption: 
"Me and my Sainty boo a few months ago…" 
A few months ago?? We can only imagine what he looks like now! 
As we reported , earlier this month, the KUWTK star shared photos of her son splashing around in a pool. 
We will NEVER get tired of seeing cute baby pics!
